contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} '''Anglo-American''' may refer to: * [[English American]], American person of English heritage, origin, or background * "Anglo-American," informal term for an [[American English|English-speaking American]] (as opposed to Spanish-speaking or Hispanic Americans), also called "[[Anglo]]" *Collective term referring to those countries that have similar legal systems based on [[common law]] which developed in England * From [[Anglo-America]], a sub-region of the Americas * The [[Anglo-American ethnic group]] * [[United Kingdom â€“ United States relations]] * [[Anglo American plc]], mining conglomerate * [[Anglo-American cataloguing rules]], library industry standard * [[Anglo-American Publishing]], a Canadian comic book publishing company active during the 1940s ==See also== *[[American English (disambiguation)]] *[[Anglosphere]] *[[British American]] {{disambig}}
